title: Video: Jens Kuross – Try To Follow
content:
Loved Jens Kuross’s Nobody Problem, which had a real 70’s vibe to it.

He’s now returned with another offering, in the form of the equally as poignant Try To Follow. The elegant vocals almost drift in and out, giving it an almost off-the-cuff feel, whilst the chorus could be lifted from Coldplay’s Parachutes; and I mean that in the best way possible (love that album). Check it out below.

Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
